title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Electricity Regulation Act, 1999)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Electricity Regulation Act, 1999) 

(Water) Levy Order, 2022 

(2) This Order shall come into operation on 31 December 2022 

(3) The Electricity Regulation Act, 1999 (Water) Levy order, 2021 (S.I.) 

No. 670 of 2021 is revoked as and from 1 January 2023

title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: In this Order—
text_raw:
3. 

In this Order— 

(a) 

all words and expressions defined in the Act or in the Water 
Services Acts 2007 to 2013 shall have the same meanings when 
used in this Order and where in any case a word or expression 
used in this Order is defined in each of the Act and the Water 
Services Acts 2007 to 2013, the word or expression shall have 
the meaning given to it by the Water Services Acts 2007 to 2013 
for the purposes of this Order; 

(b) 

a reference to legislation is a reference to that legislation as 
amended from time to time; 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [626] 3 

(c) 

(d) 

a reference to an article or schedule is to an article of, or 
schedule to, this Order; and 

a reference to a sub-article is to the sub-article of the provision 
in which the reference occurs.

title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: 4. This Order shall apply to the class of water service undertaking set out
text_raw:
4. This Order shall apply to the class of water service undertaking set out 

in the Schedule to this Order (“relevant undertaking”).
text_norm: 4 order shall apply class water service undertaking set schedule order ( relevant undertaking )

title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: 5. (1) A levy of € 3,045,814 is hereby imposed on the relevant
text_raw:
5. (1) A levy of € 3,045,814 is hereby imposed on the relevant 

undertaking. 

(2) The levy imposed by sub-article (1) shall be payable in respect of each 
period and in each case no later than the day which is 30 days after the date on 
which a request for payment of the levy instalment is made by the 
Commission. 

(3) The amount of the levy imposed on a relevant undertaking in respect of 

any period shall be a fixed payment of € 761,453.50
text_norm: 5 (1) levy eur 3 045 814 hereby imposed relevant undertaking (2) levy imposed sub-article (1) shall payable respect period case later day 30 day date request payment levy instalment made commission (3) amount levy imposed relevant undertaking respect period shall fixed payment eur 761 453.50

title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: 6. (1) Where any amount falling to be paid under Article 5 is not paid
text_raw:
6. (1) Where any amount falling to be paid under Article 5 is not paid 
within the period for payment specified in Article 5, interest thereon shall 
accrue at the prescribed interest rate compounded monthly from the date when 
such payment is due until the same is made. 

(2) In this Regulation, "the prescribed interest rate" means a rate 2% per 

annum above the Euribor rate.
text_norm: 6 (1) amount falling paid article 5 paid within period payment specified article 5 interest thereon shall accrue prescribed interest rate compounded monthly date payment due made (2) regulation prescribed interest rate mean rate 2 per annum euribor rate

title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: 7. (1) All payments shall be made in Euro on the due date by direct bank
text_raw:
7. (1) All payments shall be made in Euro on the due date by direct bank 
transfer or equivalent instantaneous transfer of funds to the bank account 
specified by the Commission. 

(2) Relevant undertakings shall notify the Commission as soon as payment 
has been made, indicating the date on which payment was made and the name 
of the bank effecting payment. 

(3) A request for payment by the Commission to the relevant undertakings 
under this Order shall be made to the relevant undertaking in accordance with 
Section 4 of the Act. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [626]

title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: The relevant undertaking for the purposes of this Levy Order is a class
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

The relevant undertaking for the purposes of this Levy Order is a class 
consisting of: 

Irish Water, a water service undertaking established under the Water Services 
Act 2013 and empowered to charge for the provision of water services under 
the Water Services (No. 2) Act 2013. 

Sealed with the common seal of the Commission for 
Regulation of Utilities on 6 December, 2022. 

AOIFE MACEVILLY, 

Chairperson of the Commission. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [626] 5

title: The Commission for Regulation of Utilities in exercise of the powers conferred
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order imposes a levy on a certain specified class of water service 
undertaking, for the purpose of meeting expenses properly incurred by the 
Commission for Regulation of Utilities in the discharge of its functions under 
the Act, the Water Act and the Act of 2013. 

 
 
 
 
 
 6 [626]
